title: Week 4 WR/CB Matchups 2021
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay, Stephania Bell and Daniel Dopp preview Thursday Night Football before giving the best WR/CB matchups to watch when setting your lineup this week. Plus, what player should you be looking to sell high on?
